column4: can anyone help me with samba on warty? is it possible to access files shared in a Windows controlled domain?
that's not what samba does
i see. what package will i need to do that kind of thing?
smbfs
ok..i'll wait for apt-get dist-upgrade to free up synaptic, then i'll check if i got that package installed. thanks!
just use mplayer
that's not on the default package listing right?
indeed, it's in multiverse. /msg ubotu repositories
thanks! i'll check it out.
thanks for the help. got to go
i got mplayer and only got to try it out on the CLI..how is the GUI made?
gmplayer, I guess
ah so mplayer is meant to run on a terminal? that's fine with me
if you want to
ubuntu seems to have pre-classified all true type fonts into corresponding directories, unlike windows, whch places all of them in one
yeah, doesn't really matter, tho
great..thanks again!
~/.fonts/ is simplest if you habve only a single user
ok i don't have ~/.fonts yet, so i'll just mkdir one?
yes
thanks. i'm importing now, will let u know the moment gimp sees them. :)
heh, np
i see the new fonts on gimp! hehe thanks!
np
